CustomBehavior.Lua: i=GetQuestLogIndexByID(13995) a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,j=GetQuestLogTitle(i) if g==-1 then SelectQuestLogEntry(i) SetAbandonQuest(i) AbandonQuest(i) end
